scripts.build:js: browserify source/index.js -o ./bundles/bundle.js -t sheetify -p [css-extract -o ./bundles/bundle.css] -t yo-yoify -g es2040 -p tinyify
scripts.build:static: enoki-build -a source/index.js -o ./public --sitemap https://hex22.org bundles _redirects .well-known robots.txt favicon.ico
scripts.build: npm run build:content && npm run build:js && npm run build:static
